'''From Ashes Reborn''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 3.3]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2022-12-07 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2022-12-27 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Eons Adrift" [[Wanderer]] ({{Anemo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Enigmatic Machinist" [[Faruzan]] ({{Anemo}}), "Canine Warrior" [[Gorou]] ({{Geo}}), and "Wise Innocence" [[Yanfei]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
